sentences.en: It looks like an innocent bystander was killed instead of you.
sentences.cn: 看样子一位无辜的旁观者当了你的替死鬼。

sentences.en: A bystander named John Roulstone wrote a poem about the event, then, at some point, Hale herself seems to have helped write it.
sentences.cn: 一个名叫约翰·鲁尔斯通的旁观者写了一首关于这件事的诗，然后，在某个时候，黑尔自己似乎也参与了这首诗的创作。

sentences.en: His response, if you asked him point-blank about her battle, was to giggle nervously, "I'm kind of a neutral bystander on that one, " he said.
sentences.cn: 如果你直截了当地问他关于她的战斗的看法，他的反应就是紧张地咯咯笑着说：“对那个事，我算是中立的旁观者吧。”
